name: LIGHTING BALLAST CONTROL LLC, petitioner, v. UNIVERSAL LIGHTING TECHNOLOGIES, INC.
name_abbreviation: Lighting Ballast Control LLC v. Universal Lighting Techs., Inc.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
LIGHTING BALLAST CONTROL LLC, petitioner,
v.
UNIVERSAL LIGHTING TECHNOLOGIES, INC.

opinions.text: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit for further consideration in light of Teva Pharmaceuticals USA, Inc. v. Sandoz, Inc.,574 U.S. ----, 135 S.Ct. 831, --- L.Ed.2d ---- (2015).

casebody.head_matter:
LIGHTING BALLAST CONTROL LLC, petitioner,
v.
UNIVERSAL LIGHTING TECHNOLOGIES, INC.
No. 13-1536.
Supreme Court of the United States
Jan. 26, 2015.
Opinion
